tutorials.title: Getting Started
tutorials.description: Prerequisites to run the Oracle Data Safe workshop in the LiveLabs tenancy.

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: This lab provides information about the Oracle Data Safe workshop.

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Register an Autonomous Database
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to register an Autonomous Transaction Processing database with Oracle Data Safe and load sample data into it.

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Provision Audit and Alert Policies
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to provision audit and alert policies in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Analyze Alerts and Audit Reports
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to analyze alerts and audit reports in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Lab 4: Assess Database Configurations and Users
tutorials.description: This lab shows you how to assess database configurations and users in your Autonomous Database by using the User Assessment feature in Oracle Data Safe.

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
